title: The Perils of "Auto-pilot Data Analysis"
description: Incorporating domain knowledge from subject matter experts is critical for building useful models. As statistician George Box said, *"All models are wrong, but some are useful."* How useful our models are depend on how well we apply domain knowledge to extract the signal from the noise.
